# ðŸŒ€ blue-objects

ðŸŒ€ `blue-objects` is an abstraction for objects that are accessible in Python and Bash on ALL machines. For example, `@geo` outputs are `object` and AI without objects is like walking without steps.

## installation

```bash
pip install blue-plugin
```
